tips.tip.astral_sorcery: To get into Astral sorcery, craft yourself an astral tome!
tips.tip.immersive_engineering: Try combining a lever with a book!
tips.tip.ars_nouveau: Try combining a source gem with a book!
tips.tip.the_one_probe: You can change settings for 'the one probe', look up it's note.
tips.tip.serene_seasons: Crops only grow in certain seasons. Watch your surroundings, or craft a calendar.
